H1.text: who has made the most premier league appearances. Frank Lampard

H2.text: who has made the most premier league appearances. James Milner

H3.text: who has made the most premier league appearances. Gareth Barry

A4.text: Gareth Barry made a total of 653 Premier League appearances for Aston Villa, Manchester City, Everton and West Bromwich Albion, the highest number of Premier League appearances in history.

A5.text: Barry made his 633rd Premier League appearance, beating Ryan Giggs' record of 632.
